1.title: A holistic view of our body ecosystem

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

1.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co-authors of Super Brain, expound on the idea of the human body as one large ecosystem.

2.title: A tour inside the brain

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

2.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, takes a look at the human brain and its functions.

3.title: Are we made of recycled stars?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

3.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, detail the history of the human body and mind. Are thoughts and experiences all recyclable items?

4.title: Do we know how the brain is wired?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

4.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co-authors of Super Brain, share the current knowledge of how the brain is connected.

5.title: How do we perceive?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

5.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, explain how sensory input helps us perceive.

6.title: How does stress affect the human body?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

6.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, examine the influential impact of stress on health.

7.title: How has our brain evolved?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

7.plot: Dr. Rudy Tanzi, neurologist and co-author of Super Brain, details the evolution of the human brain and how it will continue to advance.

8.title: Is the brain a noun or verb?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

8.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of "Super Brain", describe the constant center of activity that is our personal universe, the brain.

9.title: New insights into the brain

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

9.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, share new understandings they've acquired while writing their book.

10.title: The brain is a three pound universe

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

10.plot: Michio Kaku, famed theoretical physicist and founder of string field theory, looks at the many metaphors used throughout history to explain the workings of the human brain.

11.title: What is consciousness?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

11.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, explore the subject of consciousness and its role in the scientific community.

12.title: What is neuroplasticity?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

12.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co-authors of Super Brain, detail our brain's capability to constantly rewrite itself and the impact on how we choose to live life.

13.title: What is the "super brain"?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

13.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co-authors of "Super Brain", give us a tour of the mind as well as tell us how to use more of our brain's potential power in our lives.

14.title: When is the brain healthiest?

episode of.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (TV Series 2015)

14.plot: Dr. Deepak Chopra and Dr. Rudy Tanzi, co/authors of Super Brain, recall at what point the brain is at its healthiest state.

imdb.title: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind
akas: Curious Minds: Science of the Mind (United States)
plot: What do we know about the brain, the constant hub of activity that is our personal universe?
